website_summaries.verdict: Simple sandal design has a secure ankle strap.
pros: Comes in black full grain and light brown bull grain at Zappos and Amazon
Amazon also offers natural, ocean and nut
cons: Elastic band at top of shoe is awkward
Cushioning may make noise when you walk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I took a trip to Europe while pregnant and wore these almost exclusively. They're so comfortable, even with walking 10+ miles some days. My feet can be a little picky with shoes and these never gave me any issues. The only thing I didn't like was that they only come in whole sizes. I'm an 8.5 and bought both the 8 and 9, and kept the 9 even though it's just a tad bigger than I'd like because the 8 was too small. If you're between sizes, I'd definitely go up!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Walking and Standing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I was worried about the strap not fitting my narrow heal but that proved not to be an issue. I am taking them on vacation and have been wearing them for increasingly longer periods to make sure they remain comfortable. I recently wore them to a food festival that was on uneven ground with grass and pavement. My feet were fine for the duration, in addition to the entire hour I stood in line on asphalt to get into the event.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Gnostic

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and exactly what I was looking for! My foot is snug and won’t slide around when I’m walking, but I’m not getting blisters, either. I’ve had these for a few days now. They took only one day to break in and fit perfectly. The toe strap was a little snug right out of the box, but after breaking them in, the leather softened and I’m glad I didn’t go bigger. I’m going to end up wearing these every day this summer.
customer_reviews.author: A Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Born - Parson
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was very short from the toe to the heel. I normally wear a perfect 6 and this shoe was too small for me. It was a well made shoe. I wasn't crazy about the elastic bad at the top of the foot. Shoe wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: cmakuta

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous at first
customer_reviews.text: First time putting them on, I was nervous because the straps seem to hurt. Well with inspection, one of my straps had twisted and turned into my feet. Once I adjusted it the shoes felt really good! Second wear no problems! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: no support
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe...and even though it is a bit short...not too bad. however, there is no arch support in this shoe at all. I have another pair of born sandals that have nice support...so I was quite frankly; shocked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good fitting cute simple sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, I'm an average size 8. I prefer a wide size to have a larger toe box. I bought a size 8W and it fits great. Good cushioning on the footbed. I have high arches and these don't touch my arches at all, but I expect that as I usually put a high arch insert in my closed toe shoes. Nothing rubs too much anywhere, I can walk around the city no problem. I bought a surprise pair for my friend since she loved mine.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Really great show purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great style. Fits as expected. Comfortable so far and I have back pain issues and usually can't wear this type of shoe. The color is a great addition to my shoe collection. I've never purchased this brand before but will consider it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SHollier

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft shoes, but the length was a little short, I wear size 6.5 M or 7 M, ordered 7 M; also the elasticize strap is very loose, and I do not have narrow feet. Might just keep it since I pay only $39, good for a short run to the market or running errands that does not required much walk, but I don't think it's good for longer walk cause the loose strap.
customer_reviews.author: MEI-LING MAHR

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Attractive shoe, nice color and flattering, strange fit though. I am usually an 8.5M and ordered that size. The length was a little short, but the straps were huge. The elastized strap should feel a little tight so your foot feels secure. It was way too loose so my foot flopped alll over the place.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle51

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal, good support but strap across toes is tight. Hoping it will stretch a bit with wear.
customer_reviews.author: LC Maine

customer_reviews.title: Love my sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for long walks in warm weather. Sandals are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Segura

customer_reviews.title: toes are oddly wide
customer_reviews.text: Born is always a comfortable choice, but the toes on this shoe are wide in an unflattering way.
customer_reviews.author: ALN.

customer_reviews.title: These are great sandals! Super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals! Super comfortable and cute! Also impressed with the seller! Had an issue with the size and they paid for return shipping and got a new pair back to me very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: F. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fashionable sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I walk about a mile to work each way, and I was able to wear this shoes on my walk straight out of the box. I'm prone to blisters, so I was very pleasantly surprised that there was zero break-in required for these shoes. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Barry

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: i have a normal to narrow width foot. i usually wear a 7.5. i got an 8 and they fit perfectly. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth E Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and comfort of the shoe. I didn’t like that the shoes were too large. Overall I love born products.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Blank

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: This sandals are very comfortable. I bought two pairs. Loved them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: No way to adjust looseness. Had to return loved the shoe itself
customer_reviews.author: kab

customer_reviews.title: The way it fit across toes did not dig in ...
customer_reviews.text: The way it fit across toes did not dig in foot did not slide around , was a little to flat for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Styles

customer_reviews.title: great sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these sandals, comfortable the minute you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Dpowell

product_meta.title: Born - Womens - Parson
product_meta.description: On-trend stripes detail this distinctive ankle strap sandal.
